hero.title: Premium Residential Houses for Rent in Sushant Lok Phase 3 Gurugram
description: Sushant Lok Phase 3 Gurugram is a premium and well-planned residential locality known for its peaceful surroundings, greenery, and excellent connectivity. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sushant Lok Phase 3 Gurugram prefer this area because it offers a perfect blend of upscale living and everyday convenience. The locality is well connected to Golf Course Road, Golf Course Extension Road, and key commercial hubs, making daily commuting smooth for professionals and business owners.

Independent houses in Sushant Lok Phase 3 are designed to offer spacious layouts, privacy, and a refined lifestyle. The area is surrounded by reputed schools, hospitals, shopping malls, cafes, and recreational zones, ensuring that all lifestyle needs are easily met. Choosing a house for rent in Sushant Lok Phase 3 Gurugram is ideal for families and professionals who value comfort, premium surroundings, and long-term residential stability in one of Gurugram’s most desirable neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Is Sushant Lok Phase 3 a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is a premium and well-planned locality offering excellent connectivity and a high-quality lifestyle.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sushant Lok Phase 3?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are commonly available.

faqs.question: Is Sushant Lok Phase 3 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area is family-friendly with reputed schools, hospitals, and parks nearby.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available in Sushant Lok Phase 3?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished, semi-furnished, and unfurnished houses are available depending on the property.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sushant Lok Phase 3 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values vary based on plot size, furnishing, and exact location within the locality.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sushant Lok Phase 3?
faqs.answer: The area offers excellent connectivity via Golf Course Road and Golf Course Extension Road.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sushant Lok Phase 3?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families.

faqs.question: Is Sushant Lok Phase 3 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is considered safe with well-maintained infrastructure and a stable residential community.
